channel.title: Error with my CSS file
channel.description:
I are learning PHP at the moment and gone quite well so far but i'm stuck on a error. I made a CSS file that fully works on Html. But when i use PHP it cuts off parts of the image. Link to see what i mean - www.games.eyre-sports.co.uk I works fine with html :( My index script. [code] Gam3rz - Home Do you wish to logout?'; }*/?>
  • Home

Welcome to Eyre Games
News

The website! - Just made this website, still need to do forums, etc. I have login working though!!! :D Written in HTML and PHP. Hope you enjoy it for now. Please register and login.

Battlefield - No new on battlefield yet :| I am currently getting better at it and as soon as i get my new computer, I will be on it as much as possible.

RuneScape - 20 Million Rs2 money in stock! Darren knows all, you need paypal, for now it is £7/$13usd for 1 million.

Player of the month:

Name: Darren5591

Max points: 72
Bronze: 1
Silvers: 3
Gold's: 8

This website is under heavy contruction, i don't even know what to put in here! :P

Copyright © 2007 Eyre Sports. All rights reserved.
[/code] Please help. Thanks

item.title: Error with my CSS file
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

I are learning PHP at the moment and gone quite well so far but i’m stuck on a error.

I made a CSS file that fully works on Html. But when i use PHP it cuts off parts of the image.

Link to see what i mean - www.games.eyre-sports.co.uk

I works fine with html
